mapper.insert: insert into review_reply(reply_no, reply_contents, review_no, reply_wdate, user_id, reply_writer) values(seq_review_reply.nextval, #{reply_contents}, #{review_no}, sysdate, #{user_id}, #{reply_writer})
mapper.select: select reply_no, reply_contents, review_no, reply_wdate, user_id, reply_writer from review_reply where review_no = #{review_no} order by reply_no desc
select count(*) from review_reply where review_no=#{review_no}
select review_no from review_reply where reply_no = #{reply_no}
